page.title: 11THE HOUSE AT HUNTS FARM
page.content: The house at{Hunts Farm}is Elizabethan. It and the farm are owned by Paul and Jeffery Pratt. In one room there used to be some back stairs. They thought at one point that there was a ghost because a poodle used to look up where the stairs were. They think that the front of the house was added to the back. The main reason for this thinking was because of a well found in the living room. At the back is a small shed that used to be a privy. The{Hunts}had lived at the farm since the{15th Century.}It started being used as a farm in 1781. The last known{Hunt}died in New Zealand in 1981.
